name: Slime Space Run!
description:
"That's one small step for Slime, one giant leap for Slimekind."

Yes you heard it right! Blue Slime is going to space, but it isn't a fun trip because Red Slimes have taken over a planet so it's your job to stop them! Run with the new 3d Blue Slime between 3 lanes and collect coins, power ups and gems that will increase your score!
